Row.Text: Demand a Sphere of Influence

Demand a Sphere of Influence over a City-State. If successful, the proposing player's [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence will become 150 with the City-State. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Steam Power.
Enforce Decolonization

Enforce decolonization on a City-State. If successful, the ally of the City State will have their [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence lowered to 50 with the City-State. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Radio.
Enact an Open Door Policy
Enact an Open Door policy for a City-State. If successful, all civilizations will have their [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence set at 40 with the City-State.
{@1_CityName}
Choose a City-State for the resolution to affect
Spaceflight Control Committee

The Spaceflight Control Committee is designed to regulate the proliferation of modern ballistic technology, oversee national space programs, and limit the advance of pontentially-dangerous technology. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As long as this resolution is active, all players will suffer a global -25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production penalty for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts, +25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchase costs for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts, and +25% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for Engineers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.
{1_Spaceship}% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building SS Parts
+{1_Spaceship}% costs for [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchases of SS parts and [ICON_PEACE] Faith purchases of Great Engineers
Casus Belli

The world recognizes the need for justifiable war to resolve diplomatic disputes. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, unit maintenance costs are lowered by 15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties for capturing cities and declaring war are greatly reduced, and [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger scores decay much more rapidly than normal.
{1_UnitMaintenancePercent}% [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost for Unit Maintenance. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties greatly decreased
+{1_UnitMaintenancePercent}% [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost for Unit Maintenance. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties unchanged.
Cold War

Ideological differences have pushed the world into a cold war, and economic and political factions are forming based on ideology alone. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, players may only make [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes with civilizations that follow the same ideology, or with allied City-States. Furthermore, [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence levels with allied City-States do not decline. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.
No [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes with Ideological opponents or non-allied City-States. Allied City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence does not decay.
Prevented by an active or proposed resolution.
Unavailable until a World Ideology is active.
Boost to [ICON_FOOD]/[ICON_RESEARCH] for Civilizations with Scores below global average. +{1_GreatPersonRateMod}% generation rate for {2_GreatPersonList}
Boost to [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_CULTURE] for Civilizations with Scores below global average. +{1_GreatPersonRateMod}% generation rate for {2_GreatPersonList}
